ProjectTitle: The value of job amenities and its impact on inequality and returns to education

4. Documentation
Make sure to include the survey instrument (from) as documentation.
4. Data sharing
Why not use KU Leuven RDR (research data repository): https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr ? That is the best way for these kind of data to preserve them for 10 years and enable reuse. Better than 'request by email'.
